Q: What are the efforts being made for characterization and conservation of cattle genetic resources in India?
A: Sustained efforts are being made by ICAR-National Bureau of Animal Genetic Resources (NBAGR), Karnal for characterization and conservation of the remaining cattle genetic resources of the country. As such, till date, 50 cattle breeds of the country have been characterized and gazette notified in The Gazette of Govt. of India.
